## Description {#details}

This file provides an implementation of debug counters.

Debug counters are a tool that let you narrow down a miscompilation to a specific thing happening.

To give a use case: Imagine you have a file, very large, and you are trying to understand the minimal transformation that breaks it. Bugpoint and bisection is often helpful here in narrowing it down to a specific pass, but it&#39;s still a very large file, and a very complicated pass to try to debug. That is where debug counting steps in. You can instrument the pass with a debug counter before it does a certain thing, and depending on the counts, it will either execute that thing or not. The debug counter itself consists of a list of chunks (inclusive numeric ranges). <code>shouldExecute</code> returns true iff the list is empty or the current count is in one of the chunks.

Note that a counter set to a negative number will always execute. For a concrete example, during predicateinfo creation, the renaming pass replaces each use with a renamed use.

If I use DEBUG&#95;COUNTER to create a counter called &quot;predicateinfo&quot;, and variable name RenameCounter, and then instrument this renaming with a debug counter, like so:

if (!DebugCounter::shouldExecute(RenameCounter) &lt;continue or return or whatever not executing looks like&gt;

Now I can, from the command line, make it rename or not rename certain uses by setting the chunk list. So for example bin/opt -debug-counter=predicateinfo=47 will skip renaming the first 47 uses, then rename one, then skip the rest.

<SectionDefinition>

<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Force-enables counting all DebugCounters.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since DebugCounters are incompatible with threading (not only do they not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// make sense, but we&#39;ll also see data races), this should only be used in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// contexts where we&#39;re certain we won&#39;t spawn threads.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#aa02d659d768b5a98297800f6f73d816c"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#aa02d659d768b5a98297800f6f73d816c">enableAllCounters</a>() &#123; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#ac4330a5f1dff21ba1f4be59381832358">instance</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a7e16c989dc10f4b275ef398fbceb5837">Enabled</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a69784654584ad4bff747432cac8c4f88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a69784654584ad4bff747432cac8c4f88">isCountingEnabled</a>() &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Compile to nothing when debugging is off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifdef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#ac4330a5f1dff21ba1f4be59381832358">instance</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a7e16c989dc10f4b275ef398fbceb5837">Enabled</a> || <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#ac4330a5f1dff21ba1f4be59381832358">instance</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a9070d3561a7e94cb9ac92e9f6fa76783">ShouldPrintCounter</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">protected</span><span class="doxyHighlight">:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a9a7d658467244eae745170838e92b3ee"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a9a7d658467244eae745170838e92b3ee">addCounter</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::string &amp;Name, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::string &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4de98a9acffcef5bb4b31862cb8c72ac">Desc</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/debugcounter/counterinfo"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/debugcounter/counterinfo">CounterInfo</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/debugcounter/counterinfo/#a8765624fbf32b3745da4300914627b99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/debugcounter/counterinfo/#a8765624fbf32b3745da4300914627b99">Count</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/llvm/debugcounter/counterinfo/#a2a89ee468fe720294cc92d41ae86fb19"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/debugcounter/counterinfo/#a2a89ee468fe720294cc92d41ae86fb19">CurrChunkIdx</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a4712c75e0db127bb34154532b8fe8557"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;unsigned, CounterInfo&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a4712c75e0db127bb34154532b8fe8557">Counters</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a6254547abf5f544643098984650605ce"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a90ec8b395d535fd1335f0604cc18967c">CounterVector</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a6254547abf5f544643098984650605ce">RegisteredCounters</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Whether we should do DebugCounting at all. DebugCounters aren&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// thread-safe, so this should always be false in multithreaded scenarios.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a7e16c989dc10f4b275ef398fbceb5837"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a7e16c989dc10f4b275ef398fbceb5837">Enabled</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a9070d3561a7e94cb9ac92e9f6fa76783"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a9070d3561a7e94cb9ac92e9f6fa76783">ShouldPrintCounter</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a52574a8c1b845df5c78d5a837a180f10"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/debugcounter/#a52574a8c1b845df5c78d5a837a180f10">BreakOnLast</a> = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
